content: **gauge ** motif = 8 20 5 cm square **yarn requirements ** **main color mc ** lily® sugar n cream® twists 2 oz/56 7 g #20420 rose twists **6 balls** *or* bernat® handicrafter® twists 1 5 oz/42 5 g #13420 rose twists **8 balls** **color a ** lily® sugar n cream solids 2 5 oz/70 9 g #01004 soft ecru **6 balls** *or* bernat® handicrafter cotton solids 50 g/1 75 oz #00002 off white **8 balls** a placemat diagram is provided in the pdf instructions in spanish were available on the bernat site but are no longer found online french instructions are included in the pdf download
